description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. Are you ready to play the wildest, sexiest, scariest game ever made? No? Well good, then how about HOUSE OF 1000 DEMONS!? Stumble through a house haunted with terrible demons from a dimension far more annoying then our own. Are you a bad enough dude to save your house? Probably not.
